title: Grade School Student Succubus
description:
This is a slightly erotic tale about a succubus attending to a human school.

Humans and demons have agreed to live in harmony with each other, and the first step towards that goal is allowing succubi children to attend to human schools as some sort of program to study abroad. Of course, the succubi will have to obey the human rules, but humans will also have to adapt to the necessities of their new neighbors, which usually involves spicy things.
